Description:
Detects a whoami.exe executed with the /priv command line flag instructing the tool to show all current user privileges. This is often used after a privilege escalation attempt.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Security Privileges Enumeration Via Whoami.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\whoami.exe' and original_file_name = 'whoami.exe') and (command like '% /priv%' or command like '% -priv%'))
